Managers:  We have a problem
Devs:  What's that?
Managers:  This game seems to be so bad everybody will refund it on steam.   We will not make any money.
Devs:  Sorry, but we can't fix something this bad.
Managers:  Well, you're fired.
Devs:  Wait... What if we make the core of the game F2P, and hide all the real content behind non-refundable DLC and battle passes?
Managers:  Genius!  When can you make this happen?
Devs:  Yesterday!  As a bonus, we also added a 3rd party account requirement to play the game.
Managers:  Best idea yet.  This can't possibly go wrong!
The world doesn't need Overwatch, and it doesn't need Blizzard anymore.
